attributes.action: Reintroduce compulsory mask wearing on public transport and in shops
attributes.additional_details: To save lives, protect the vulnerable and help reduce the spread of coronavirus.
attributes.background: To help reduce coronavirus transmission and protect lives, reintroduce the compulsory wearing of face masks on public transport and in shops.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616
 
Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694
